Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory283.png'}
{3: 'Some time has passed since the Gray Raven escorted Ruolin back.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'You came at the right time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'At the right time, again?', 3: '8'}
{3: 'She looks the same as always, but there is something about her that betrays her composure.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "It's urgent, and let me bring you up to speed in 15 seconds. Remember Ruolin from before?", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Bridget', 3: "She's been assigned to a different group. She has a good attitude, but is having a hard time fitting in and working with the team for fights. She seems absent-minded all the time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'She needs a rest.', 3: '13'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "The body can recover with rest, but it's going to take the heart a lot longer to do the same.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "So the higher-ups have suggested that she have this part of her memory deleted, because it's having too strong an influence on her.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Only this part?', 3: '16'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'They said if they had Asimov do it, he could accurately conceal certain parts of her memory.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'The negotiation went well. They went over her compensation and even had her signature already.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'But she bailed at the last moment and came back here.', 4: '1'}
{3: "She points at the e-mail on the projection screen. It seems like she's only just received the news."}
{2: 'Should I go and help look for her?', 3: '24'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "You've already helped me once, so I find it easier to just ask you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'These are her coordinates. She seems to be around the Red Tide. I have your protective equipment ready for you. Go as soon as you can.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg1601_7.jpg'}
{3: "Following Ruolin's coordinates, the Gray Raven heads straight into the Red Tide on Bridget's reinforced speedboat."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The target is standing on the slab in the middle of the Red Tide! She appears severely infected and is about to max out!'}
{3: 'With your monitoring goggles, you can see Ruolin standing on an elevated slab of rock in the middle of the Red Tide. She is looking at the blood-red water, in which a red projection floats.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory289.png'}
{2: '...A Red Tide projection!', 3: '35'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Speed up!'}
{2: 'Red Tide Projection', 3: '......'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg1601_7.jpg'}
{3: 'The Gray Raven heads for Ruolin at full speed. Ruolin walks toward the edge of the slab after speaking with the Red Tide, her expression now free of worries.'}
{2: 'Ruolin! Come back!', 3: '41'}
{3: 'She hears you calling for her at the top of your voices, and she smiles as she turns to face this way.'}
{3: 'Ruolin seems to have said something, yet what she said is drowned out by the splashing waves.'}
{3: "A red ocean apart, she waves at the speedboat that's speeding toward her. Then, she takes a leap forward..."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory283.png'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "She worked for me before she joined the Task Force. She wasn't outstanding at all, but worked hard and never crossed the line.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Cheer up already.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Bridget's comforting tone is anything but comforting. She forces a smile as she points at the footage from the monitoring goggles."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Look at her mouth.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'She\'s saying, "Thank you"...', 4: '1'}
